subject: Test IT Template - System Check
body:
Dear Team,

This is a test template to verify the system is working properly.

Please confirm receipt.

Regards,
[Name]
[Position]

subject: IT Maintenance Notification
body:
Dear All,

Scheduled maintenance will occur on [Date] from [Time] to [Time].

Systems affected: [List]

Please save your work before the maintenance window.

Regards,
IT Department
